synsets.definition: Mental calmness and composure, especially in a difficult situation; emotional balance maintained across time
Buddhist concept of equanimous mindfulness; mental state of calm detachment and balanced observation of temporal experience
Confucian principle of maintaining emotional and behavioral balance; avoiding extremes in temporal emotional responses
Ancient Greek philosophical ideal of serene calmness and emotional equilibrium regardless of external temporal circumstances
Islamic concept of divinely-granted tranquility and inner peace that transcends temporal anxieties
Sanskrit term for deep spiritual peace and tranquility that remains constant across past, present, and future concerns
Hebrew concept of restorative peace and temporal rest; balanced state free from past regrets and future anxieties
Southern African philosophy emphasizing balanced relationships and emotional equilibrium within community temporal experience
Japanese principle of social and emotional harmony; maintaining group equilibrium across temporal situations
To bring into or maintain emotional balance across temporal experiences; to stabilize affective responses
Arabic term for heart's stillness and tranquility; emotional equilibrium that transcends temporal concerns
Sanskrit yogic principle of mental tranquility and emotional evenness maintained through temporal changes
Navajo concept of living in balance and harmony; maintaining beautiful equilibrium across temporal experience
German philosophical concept of serene letting-be; composed acceptance of temporal flow without resistance
Sufi practice of balanced spiritual presence; maintaining equanimous awareness in temporal spiritual communion
Having emotional equilibrium and mental stability; maintaining composure across temporal fluctuations
Zen concept of ordinary mind free from temporal emotional disturbances; natural state of balanced awareness
Virtue of moderation and balanced response to temporal experiences; avoiding emotional extremes
Portuguese-influenced balanced state of temporal awareness without overwhelming nostalgia or future anxiety
Sanskrit meditative state of balanced awareness; equanimous attention that transcends temporal concerns
French concept of coolness under pressure; maintaining emotional equilibrium during temporal challenges
Buddhist sympathetic joy tempered with equanimity; balanced appreciation without temporal attachment
State of balanced awareness in the present moment; equanimous attention to temporal flow
Inner state of peaceful calm and emotional stillness that remains stable across temporal experience
Korean concept of heart-centered emotional balance; maintaining relational equilibrium across time
Greek wisdom characterized by balanced understanding and equanimous response to temporal experience
Balanced acknowledgment and embracing of temporal reality without excessive emotional charge
Remaining emotionally consistent and balanced across temporal changes and fluctuations
Chinese concept of accepting karmic connections with equanimity; balanced response to temporal destiny
Peaceful acceptance of temporal circumstances without bitterness or excessive emotional investment
Islamic virtue of patient endurance and balanced perseverance through temporal difficulties
Buddhist principle of avoiding extremes; maintaining emotional balance between temporal opposites
State of emotional freedom from excessive temporal attachment while maintaining engaged awareness
Having a calm, balanced temperament; not easily disturbed by temporal emotional fluctuations
Internal state of harmonious balance; emotional rhythm that flows steadily through temporal experience
Patient tolerance and balanced restraint in response to temporal challenges or provocations
State of balanced observation; witnessing temporal experience without excessive emotional involvement
Japanese warrior principle emphasizing composed balance and equanimity in temporal challenges
Condition of balanced emotional forces; stable state maintained across temporal fluctuations
Characterized by balanced consideration and thoughtful response to temporal experiences
Emotionally grounded and stable; maintaining balanced center across temporal storms
Islamic concept of balanced trust in divine providence; equanimous reliance transcending temporal worry
Maintaining balanced perspective without excessive temporal emotional coloring; impartial awareness
Stable emotional terrain; balanced psychological state free from temporal peaks and valleys
Musical and emotional tempo of moderate, balanced pace; steady rhythm through temporal experience
To bring emotional responses into balanced, stable range across temporal experiences
Taoist concept of primordial simplicity and balance; return to natural equanimous state
Balanced satisfaction with temporal circumstances; peaceful acceptance without excessive desire
Balanced emotional detachment enabling clear assessment of temporal situations without distortion
State of balanced forces and equal emotional weight; equilibrium maintained across temporal tensions
